alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:37PM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...The Wet Mountain Valley, the mid Arkansas River Valley east of Salida to west of Canon City, and Huerfano County including Walsenburg. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the late evening commute as well as the Thursday morning commute. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft
